In three sentences
Comments

The campus of Macomb is protecetd by an armed security force who protect students needs. I have not heard of any crime being perpetrated upon any student in my time their. The college also uses the campus to train students in the Law-Enforcement curriculum. The campus is very safe.

Their are numerous Greek Clubs that are present on the campus and always looking for new members. Just keep your G.P.A. at or above a 3.0 and you can apply for the one that best suits your social needs.
Macomb has a Track Team, Basketball Team, Cross Country Team, Swimming Team, as well as a Debate Team.
Technical, Culinary, Nursing

Once a year at the K building, the Student Activities Committee hosts a Talent Show that is open to all student and all variety of Talent. It's Macomb's very own rendition of America's Got Talent. Students fill the auditorium up every year to support and cheer for their fellow companions. It's always a wonderful time for the students and staff.

You definitely get more bang for the buck at this community college. Their technical and culinary programs work in cohesion with the industry leaders of their perspective fields. The Automotive Technician Program for example works side by side with General Motors to turn out the next generation of engineers and technicians with hands on experience and lectures and seminars given by representatives. As a result students who successfully complete the program often are hired by the corporation.

For fun check out the infamous K building where students gather for discussions, gaming, and dining. If you require more activity in your leisure time, then the J building should satisfy all of your physical fitness needs. You can try the Olympic track or the Olympic swimming pool, or shoot some hoops in the gymnasium. The staff at Macomb definitely considered the stress levels of studies and have proovided adequate reliefs.
The food is great and not that expensive. It is prepared by a host of chefs and line cooks from Macomb's world renowned Culinary Arts Program.
There are not any dorms that I have Knowledge of.

The professors really take their time to make sure that you get the information. Class sizes are small which allow the staff to work with a student who may be falling behind. The classes are designed so that at the end of each semester, students are definitely able to retain the information that they have been studying.

Have great study habits. Be prepared to work with and learn from professors of all types of backgrounds. Treat the curriculum of your choice as if you were at a four year university and not a community college.

Macomb Community College has great technical programs that can prepare students for advanced studies in the technical program that they are focused on. Macomb Community College offers a diverse experience for students which complements the fundamental belief of America being a place where all nationalities can study and learn from each other. Macomb Community College also offer affordable tuition, and a faculty of experieced professors who get students ready for their careers or for furthering their educational goals.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot You really learn a lot at college, just remember to study what you have learned occasionally. Login to rate or flag the reviews Kayleigh from Clinton Township, MI 07/12/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 79 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Macomb isn't specifically for a single type of person. It's a cheaper alternative to a larger university, the only thing it lacks is the personal dorm rooms. Macomb welcomes great diversity! Tips for prospective students I suggest you get referrals for teachers, either from friends or counselors. Also leave early, (not just the first day) depending on what lot your in, it can be very time consuming to find a spot-especially in winter. Register as early as possible, join a waitlist if need be, your chances are good. Bang for the buck
